# CitizenShipper

> CitizenShipper is an online marketplace connecting people who need to transport pets, vehicles, boats, and household goods with professional drivers who can provide these shipping services.

CitizenShipper operates as a platform where shipping customers can list shipments and receive bids from verified, professional transporters. The platform specializes in pet shipping, vehicle transportation, boat transportation, and other specialized transport services.

## Company Information

- [About CitizenShipper](https://citizenshipper.com/about-us.md): Information about the company, its history, and mission.
- [How It Works](https://citizenshipper.com/how-it-works.md): Step-by-step guide explaining how the platform connects shippers with transporters.
- [Homepage](https://citizenshipper.com/index.html.md): Overview of CitizenShipper's services and features.
- [Frequently Asked Questions](https://citizenshipper.com/faq.md): Answers to common questions about the platform's services.
- [Help Center and Support](https://help.citizenshipper.com/hc/en-us): Read Help Center articles to find answers to your problems and open support tickets when needed.
- [Company Blog](https://citizenshipper.com/blog/): CitizenShipper's company blog on everything about shipping pets and other hard-to-ship items.

## Pet Transportation Services

- [Pet Shipping Cities](https://citizenshipper.com/pet-shipping/all-cities.md): Information about pet transportation services available in cities across the United States.
- [Pet Transportation](https://citizenshipper.com/pet-transportation.md): Detailed guide on pet transportation services.
- [Dog Transportation](https://citizenshipper.com/dog-transportation.md): Specialized information about shipping dogs safely.
- [Dog Shipping Breeds](https://citizenshipper.com/dog-shipping/all-breeds.md): Complete list of dog breeds and their shipping requirements.
- [Dog Breeds](https://citizenshipper.com/pets/dogs/all-breeds.md): Information about different dog breeds and their transportation requirements.
- [Cat Transportation](https://citizenshipper.com/cat-transportation.md): Specialized information about shipping cats safely.
- [Cat Transportation Breeds](https://citizenshipper.com/cat-transportation/all-breeds.md): Complete list of cat breeds and their transportation options.
- [Cat Breeds](https://citizenshipper.com/pets/cats/all-breeds.md): Information about different cat breeds and their transportation requirements.
- [Military Pet Relocation](https://citizenshipper.com/military-moves.md): Information about PCS pet relocation services for military families.
- [Military Bases Pet Relocation](https://citizenshipper.com/military-moves/all-bases.md): PCS pet relocation services for all military bases.

## Vehicle & Specialty Transportation

- [Vehicle Transportation](https://citizenshipper.com/vehicle-transportation.md): Details about car, motorcycle, and other vehicle shipping services.
- [Cars and Other Vehicles Shipping Cities](https://citizenshipper.com/vehicle-transportation/all-cities.md): Information about cars and other vehicles shiping services available in cities across the United States.
- [Motorcycle Transportation](https://citizenshipper.com/motorcycle-transportation.md): Information about motorcycle shipping services.
- [Boat Transportation](https://citizenshipper.com/boat-transportation.md): Information about boat and watercraft shipping.
- [Boat Transportation Cities](https://citizenshipper.com/boat-transportation/all-cities.md): Information about boat transportation services available in cities across the United States.
- [RV Transport](https://citizenshipper.com/rv-transport.md): Information about recreational vehicle transportation services.
- [Cost to Ship](https://citizenshipper.com/cost-to-ship.md): Pricing information and cost estimators for different shipping services.
- [Shipping Large Items](https://citizenshipper.com/shipping-large-items.md): Information about transporting oversized or heavy items.

## Moving & Freight Services

- [Apartment Moves](https://citizenshipper.com/apartment-moves.md): Information about apartment moving services.
- [Furniture Shipping](https://citizenshipper.com/shipping-furniture.md): Information about furniture shipping services.
- [Equipment Shipping](https://citizenshipper.com/equipment-shipping.md): Information about heavy equipment shipping services.
- [Pallet Shipping](https://citizenshipper.com/pallet-shipping.md): Information about pallet shipping services.
- [Freight Shipping](https://citizenshipper.com/freight-shipping-quotes.md): Information about freight shipping services.
- [Package Delivery](https://citizenshipper.com/package-delivery.md): Information about package delivery services.

## For Transporters

- [Driver Profiles](https://citizenshipper.com/drivers.md): Profiles and information about CitizenShipper's transport providers.
- [Become a Driver](https://citizenshipper.com/new-drivers.md): Information for transporters interested in joining the platform.
- [Animal Transporter Guide](https://citizenshipper.com/animal-transporter-guide.md): Guide for becoming an animal transporter.
- [Motorcycle Carriers](https://citizenshipper.com/motorcycle-carriers.md): Information about becoming a motorcycle carrier.

## For Breeders

- [Breeder Services](https://citizenshipper.com/breeders.md): Information for pet breeders using the transportation services.

## Other Resources

- [Partner With Us](https://citizenshipper.com/partners.md): Partner with CitizenShipper team with services in transportation and pets-related industries.
- [Affiliate Program](https://citizenshipper.com/affiliate-program.md): Information about CitizenShipper's affiliate program.
- [Referral Program](https://citizenshipper.com/referral-program.md): Information about CitizenShipper's referral program.
- [Tools](https://citizenshipper.com/tools.md): Tools and resources for CitizenShipper users.
- [Sitemap](https://citizenshipper.com/sitemap.md): Visual sitemap of the CitizenShipper website.
